justification: “For every statement in all three topic domains, participants indicated … (2) their confidence in their assessment (from 50% to 100%).”

measured_by: Estimate of percentage of other respondents endorsing the option (0%–100%)
justification: Participants also provided “(3) their estimate of the percentage of other respondents believing the statement to be true … (from 0% to 100%).”

measured_by: Difference between own decision and own projection relative to summed differences of others’ decisions and projections
justification: The paper defines Projection as “The difference of own decision and own projection in relation to the sum of all differences of others' decisions and projections.”

measured_by: Difference between participant’s projection and the average estimation
justification: Table 1 lists “Projection accuracy 2: Projection accuracy as the difference between projection and the average estimation.”
